original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 13:24:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.PostTypeId=1 AND p.Score=2 AND p.FavoriteCount<=12 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-13 11:42:08' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-29 00:27:05' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-01-03 23:47:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 12:48:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-27 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 13:24:22'
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation >= 1 AND users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1.UserId=E6.Id)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-13 11:42:08' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-29 00:27:05'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E6.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.PostTypeId = 1 AND posts.Score = 2 AND posts.FavoriteCount <= 12
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E6E3.PostId=E2.Id)

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-01-03 23:47:35' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 12:48:36'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E6E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E6E3E2.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-27 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E6E3E2E4E5 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E6E3E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E6E3E2E4.UserId=E5.UserId)
